evolution.description: Daily at 3 AM UTC â€” runs Ebbinghaus decay, PageRank, and consolidation

ebbinghaus_forgetting.description: Applies Ebbinghaus forgetting curve: retention = e^(-t/S) where S is stability

pagerank.description: Weighted PageRank with relationship weights as edge importance

consolidation.description: Merges near-duplicate entities based on name similarity and shared relationships

consolidation_rules.description: Merge entities with identical lowercase names
Merge entities where one's name appears in another's aliases
Merge entities frequently co-occurring in same memories

temporal_validity.description: Tracks when facts were true/false using valid_from and valid_until timestamps

pruning.description: Removes edges below weight threshold and isolated entities with no connections
